name: Select and Share
author: Renato Ferraz

sections.description: This plugins makes possible for your readers to share pieces of content from your site in the following social networks: Facebook, Twitter, Orkut, Delicious, Hotmail, LinkedIn, Yahoo!, MySpace, and also on WordPress and on e-mail. You also will have the option to follow stats on the texts that are being shared and the reach in each social network.
sections.installation: Upload the Select and Share plugin to your blog, Activate it.
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • First working version.

0.2

  • Add WordPress and Email

2.0

  • New Features: Option to follow stats on the texts that are being shared and the reach in each social network.
